Package Circles.Model

Class MovieDates

java.lang.Object
Circles.Model.MovieDates
public class MovieDates extends Object
Date to LocalDate manipulation. A set of functions to calculate days between dates, and also Date-to-LocalDate conversion.
Version:
2022-03-02
Author:
Robert Nilsson

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MovieDates​(Date start, Date end)
    Sets up methods for retrieving: how long a circle is running, in days, how long until a circle is closed, in days.

    Sets up methods for retrieving: how long a circle is running, in days, how long until a circle is closed, in days how long until a movie in a circle is closed, in days.

  • Constructor Details

    • MovieDates

      public MovieDates​(Date start, Date end, int moviePos, int totalMovies)
      Sets up methods for retrieving: how long a circle is running, in days, how long until a circle is closed, in days how long until a movie in a circle is closed, in days.
      Parameters:
      start - startdate of circle
      end - enddate of circle
      moviePos - position of movie in the circle
      totalMovies - how many movies are in the circle
